text: 🚨 Energy Alert! 🚨 Europe could face higher energy prices this winter as Russia-Ukraine gas deal ends. 💰🔥 The EU's reliance on Russian gas imports has been a hot topic since the invasion of Ukraine in 2022. With the contract expiring at the end of this year, a cold winter could create a "worst case" scenario for countries reliant on transit through Ukraine. 🌪️💔 Brussels has been working to reduce Russian gas imports, but the task force report suggests there's still work to be done. 🤔💡 EU energy ministers are meeting today to discuss energy security for winter 2024-2025. Stay tuned for updates! 📣
